body_html: can you invert the if condition? #if defined #else ... #endif. This to be able to remove the !. I had a feeling that I had to do something like this from the single example that I found in TF using these functions.
body_text: can you invert the if condition? #if defined #else ... #endif. This to be able to remove the !. I had a feeling that I had to do something like this from the single example that I found in TF using these functions.
body: can you invert the if condition? `#if defined #else ... #endif`. This to be able to remove the `!`. I had a feeling that I had to do something like this from the single example that I found in TF using these functions.
